Package com.File

Class Serialize

java.lang.Object
com.File.Serialize
Direct Known Subclasses:
Component, GameObject, Pair, Transform
public abstract class Serialize extends Object
Abstract class to serialize the objects. Will be extended by most of the components.

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      public abstract String serialize(int tabSize)
      The method which all the components extending this class will have to override.
      Parameters:
      tabSize - number of tabs to be indented correctly
      Returns:
      the string to be written into the file

    • addTabs

      Parameters:
      tabSize - number of tabs to put inside the string
      Returns:
      number of tabs given by tab size

    • addStringProperty

      public String addStringProperty(String name, String value, int tabSize, boolean newline, boolean comma)
      Utility method to add a string property to the string inside the file.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the property
      value - the string
      tabSize - number of tabs
      newline - true/false if we want newline or not
      comma - true/false if we want comma or not
      Returns:
      the string property to be added.
